column4: hi , i installed some themes, and they are not there in appearance, how do i make them re-appear? google was no help
great - and... were there any errors?
should i delete them from .themes and start over?
yeah i had errors (newbie) looking for a cool theme
it depends... I usually go the direct route and extract the files straight to /usr/share/themes
less of a headache, because I ran into the same probs. as you
whichever ones don't show up in appearance settings :)
in other words - the ones that don't work :P
